title: ImpactFlow — Social Impact Marketing Agency Website

requirements.text: Create a responsive navigation bar with the 'ImpactFlow' brand name styled as a text logo using deep blue (#0B3D91) and emerald green. Include nav links: About, Solutions, Industries, How It Works, Contact. Add a sticky/scroll effect and smooth scroll to sections.

quotes: Minimal footer with: About, Solutions, Industries, Contact

acceptanceCriteria: Navbar is sticky on scroll
Logo uses deep blue and emerald green typography
All nav links scroll smoothly to their respective sections
Navbar is fully responsive on mobile (hamburger menu)

requirements.text: Build a hero section with headline 'Where Marketing Meets Social Impact', subheadline 'We help schools, hospitals, and growing brands connect with communities through purpose-driven offline campaigns.', and two CTA buttons: 'Start a Campaign' (primary) and 'Partner With Us' (secondary outline). Background should be a soft abstract water-inspired gradient (deep blue to soft aqua) with subtle floating bottle silhouettes rendered in CSS/SVG, minimal and modern.

quotes: Headline: Where Marketing Meets Social Impact
Soft abstract water-inspired gradient with subtle floating bottle silhouettes

acceptanceCriteria: Headline and subheadline render prominently with bold typography
Two CTA buttons are visible and styled per brand colors
Background gradient transitions from deep blue to soft aqua
Floating bottle silhouettes are subtle and not distracting
Section is full-viewport height on desktop

requirements.text: Build an 'About Us' section titled 'Redefining Grassroots Marketing' with the provided body copy and a four-point bullet list: Strategic local outreach, Free community giveaways, Responsible brand messaging, High-trust public engagement. End with the line: 'We believe marketing works best when it benefits both brands and people.'
acceptanceCriteria: Section title, body copy, and four bullet points all render correctly
Closing line is visually distinct (e.g., italic or accent color)
Layout is clean, uncluttered, and responsive

requirements.text: Build a 'Water Marketing Solution' section titled 'Branded Water Distribution Campaigns' with the provided body copy, a four-point campaign inclusions list, and pricing details (Minimum Order: 25,000 branded bottles, ₹8 per bottle, excluding campaign customization). Include a CSS/SVG illustrated mineral water bottle mockup with a customizable label area, styled minimally in brand colors.

quotes: Mockup of a clean mineral water bottle with customizable label area

acceptanceCriteria: All body copy and bullet points render correctly
Pricing is displayed professionally without profit/margin language
CSS/SVG bottle mockup is clean, minimal, and visually on-brand
Section layout is responsive

requirements.text: Build a 'Target Industries' section titled 'Built for Impact-Driven Brands' showing five icon cards: Schools & Educational Institutions, Colleges & Coaching Centers, Hospitals & Healthcare Providers, Community Events & Social Campaigns, Local Businesses & Expanding Brands. Each card has an icon and short label. Add tagline: 'We specialize in organizations that serve people across all age groups.'
acceptanceCriteria: Five industry cards render with distinct icons and labels
Tagline appears below the cards
Cards are displayed in a responsive grid
Icons use brand accent colors

requirements.text: Build a 'How It Works' section with a clean 5-step process: (1) Campaign Planning, (2) Custom Branding, (3) Production & Quality Check, (4) Targeted Distribution, (5) Campaign Report. Each step has a numbered icon, title, and short description. Include subtle entrance animations (fade-in or slide-in on scroll).

quotes: Use clean step icons and smooth animations

acceptanceCriteria: All five steps render with icons, titles, and descriptions
Steps are visually connected (e.g., connecting line or arrow)
Entrance animations trigger on scroll
Layout is responsive (stacks vertically on mobile)

requirements.text: Build a 'Social Impact' section titled 'Marketing With Meaning' with the provided body copy about community utility, hydration, and responsible brand visibility. Include a generated community illustration image as the section visual.
acceptanceCriteria: Section title and body copy render correctly
Community illustration image is displayed as section visual
Section layout is responsive with text and image side by side on desktop

requirements.text: Build a 'Why Choose Us' section with five value proposition points displayed as icon + text cards: Transparent campaign structure, Hyperlocal targeting expertise, Clean and compliant branding, Strong community engagement, Designed for trust-building.
acceptanceCriteria: All five points render with icons and text
Cards are displayed in a clean grid layout
Design is minimal and consistent with brand colors

requirements.text: Build a contact section with CTA headline 'Let's Build Impact Together' and a form with fields: Name, Organization, Phone, Email, Campaign Objective (textarea). Integrate the form with Formspree so submissions are sent via POST to a Formspree endpoint. Show a success message after submission. Include a comment in code indicating where to replace the Formspree endpoint URL.
acceptanceCriteria: All five form fields render and are required
Form submits via POST to Formspree endpoint
Success message displays after successful submission
Formspree endpoint URL is clearly marked with a comment for easy replacement
Form is styled consistently with the brand

requirements.text: Build a minimal footer with navigation links (About, Solutions, Industries, Contact), social media icon placeholders, and tagline: 'Strategic Marketing. Community Impact.' Style consistently with the deep blue/emerald green brand palette.
acceptanceCriteria: All four nav links are present and functional
Social media icon placeholders are rendered
Tagline is displayed
Footer background uses brand deep blue color
Layout is responsive

requirements.text: Apply a consistent design system across all sections: Primary color deep blue (#0B3D91), accent emerald green, soft aqua gradient as secondary, white background. Use bold sans-serif headings and clean body typography. Add subtle scroll-triggered animations (fade-in) on section entry. Ensure the overall aesthetic is premium, minimal, corporate, and trust-building with no clutter.
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette is consistent across all sections
Typography hierarchy is clear and uses sans-serif fonts
Scroll-triggered fade-in animations are present on at least the main content sections
No section feels overcrowded or cluttered
Site is fully responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop

requirements.text: Render the generated images (community event illustration and hero background) as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them in the appropriate sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Images load correctly from the /assets/generated path
Hero background image is applied to the hero section
Community illustration image is displayed in the Social Impact section

constraints: Do not use loud or flashy design elements — keep the aesthetic minimal and premium
Do not mention profit margins or business costs in the water bottle pricing section
Contact form must use Formspree for submission handling (no backend required)
All sections must be single-page with smooth scroll navigation
nonGoals: No backend data storage or CMS integration
No user authentication or login system
No actual logo image file — text-based logo only

required: Minimalistic illustration of people at a community outdoor event receiving water bottles, soft warm tones with green and blue accents, modern flat art style (community-event.dim_1200x600.png)
Abstract water-inspired background with soft deep blue to aqua gradient and faint translucent bottle silhouettes, clean and premium (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
